author: Maria Cohut Ph.D.
title: Remdesivir: 'Very potent inhibitor' of SARS-CoV-2? - Medical News Today
description: Remdesivir: 'Very potent inhibitor' of SARS-CoV-2? Medical News Today Most important recent studies on Coronavirus | 4 New studies on COVID-19 | World News WION 'Significant' coronavirus mutation discovered, could make vaccine search 'futile,' study says Fox …
content:
Experimental Ebola drug remdesivir could stop SARS-CoV-2 from replicating by acting on a key enzyme, according to a new study from the University of Alberta.
Last month, the World Health Organization (WHO) announced the launch of a multinational trial, testi… [+3379 chars]
